main event: An observation of three spherical objects at Norton AFB, California, on May 21, 1955.
interesting points: The objects first appeared silver, then disappeared, then became visible again, The objects left a short conical vapor trail, The observation lasted approximately 30-45 seconds, Witnesses reported a bright sun during the sighting, The report concluded it might have been a balloon or a reflection.
witness description: 1st Lt. R.C. Taler, a jet pilot with 2000 hours of flying time.
